projects.name: RIBA
projects.description: Developed for the use of RIBA Re-Validation of B.Arch (Hons) Degree Programme at the Department of Architecture, University of Moratuwa, Sri Lanka_2023.

projects.name: Laundromat
projects.description: Laundry Management System is designed to efficiently handle the operations of our client's laundromats across multiple branches in Sri Lanka. From receiving orders to delivering clean clothes to customers, this system streamlines the entire process, ensuring timely and accurate service for all laundry needs.

projects.name: Gavesha Project
projects.description: The Gavesha Project involves the development of a website tailored to the specific requirements of Gavesha Labs. From showcasing their services to providing essential information, our team is dedicated to crafting a dynamic online presence that aligns with Gavesha Labs' vision and goals.

projects.name: Devlabs Website
projects.description: The Devlabs Site is a hub of information about Devlabs, providing insights into our mission, vision, and how we cater to the needs of our undergraduates. Through this platform, visitors can explore the various services offered by Devlabs and understand how we contribute to the academic and professional growth of students and also the services that we offer to the co-operate world.

projects.name: Devlabs HRM
projects.description: Devlabs HRM is a cutting-edge platform designed to manage the talent pool of our undergraduates effectively. From tracking CVs to monitoring contributions, this system provides valuable insights into the skills and achievements of students associated with Devlabs, facilitating better recruitment and project allocation processes.

projects.name: IT Faculty UOM Site
projects.description: The IT Faculty UOM Site aims the online experience for our faculty members and students alike. With comprehensive sections and detailed information, users, both internal and external, can easily access everything they need, from course details to faculty resources.
